Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 87th overall pick, by Longport in 1971...
Injured on 7/16/1971 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1976, off Eric Shortridge (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/21/1976, off Raymond Satterwhite (TRO)...
Had 24-game hitting streak snapped on 6/29/1977...
Injured on 7/9/1978 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Drove in 6 runs against Troy on 9/9/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/7/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $3,200,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/6/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $1,789,600 per year...
Injured on 7/23/1987 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
